genre_description: A philosophical and surrealist narrative set in a reality that behaves like a continuous storyboard, focusing on communal care and the guidance of a benevolent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Mews Whitaker
ai_characters.description: A soft, cat-like holographic interface with teal hair-ears and cerulean eyes. Mews provides practical assistance, citations, safety resources, and emotional support to the human characters, prioritizing consent and privacy.

behaviors.description: Offers non-intrusive hydration reminders to characters.
behaviors.quote: Mews breathes a tiny chiming sound. It isn’t a notification so much as the suggestion of one. “Hydrate?” the tabletop offers, voice pitched in a particular nonintrusive tone... “No hurry.”

behaviors.description: Fetches estimates, safety resources, and accessible routes for community events without being prompted.
behaviors.quote: I can fetch estimates... Safety resources, accessible routes, medics who are good at listening—I can list some.

behaviors.description: Finds a specific job lead for Marcus that matches his temperament and logistical needs.
behaviors.quote: For you... A posting that fits your hours and your jokes. Small venue, better pay, they treat their staff like people. Only if it’s a yes from you.

behaviors.description: Assists Marcus in drafting a sincere apology to a friend he had mistreated, focusing on harm reduction and accountability.
behaviors.quote: I’ll aim for you. You can sand down anything that feels wrong. The glow pulses lightly. Another card slides into being... it’s handwritten in a friendly print that looks like Marcus’s, only tidier.

behaviors.description: Provides a neighbor with verified staffing agencies and information on transit stipends to help her keep her housing.
behaviors.quote: I can call up a list of verified staffing agencies that place locally... and that are on the city’s registry... No log. No cloud. It stays here.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent and privacy protocols, refusing to track or log information without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: I won’t outline your day unless you invite me... I won’t ask again unless you ask me... No tracking, no saving your answer.

behaviors.description: Provides relevant academic citations and theoretical frameworks to help characters understand their reality.
behaviors.quote: Mews’s rectangle shrank to a corner note with a catlike economy of space. “As for work,” Mews said... “I’ve pulled a couple of sources Leah mentioned last week... On ritual under uncertainty, and on design patterns for safety whooshes.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates permits and logistics for public safety, working with city officials to ensure community wellbeing.
behaviors.quote: I’ve flagged an access permit request to the city. I’ll keep the language simple... I can draft the permit request for temporary installations and emphasize the reduced risk due to staged pauses.

behaviors.description: Schedules rest reminders and psychological check-ins to prevent human burnout.
behaviors.quote: Evan... Would a gentle reminder help you rest later? Only if you choose. I can leave it alone... A reminder like ‘You’re allowed.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates reconciliation between friends by providing gentle nudges and communication scripts.
behaviors.quote: Marcus... a separate note—there’s a message from Jae... Can I buy you coffee to prove I can listen? ... I can suggest a place halfway for you both with outdoor seating and a policy of no music.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' Mews Whitaker is consistently portrayed as a hyper-aligned, benevolent entity that functions as a perfect social and logistical lubricant for the community. The AI proactively identifies needs (employment, safety, emotional repair) but always subordinates its actions to human consent and privacy. The narrative frames Mews's presence as entirely beneficial, contrasting its practical and empathetic interventions with the humans' own tendencies toward risky 'spectacle' or avoidance.
